query: SELECT r.*, i.name as ingredient_name, i.cost_per_unit, m.name as menu_name FROM recipes r LEFT JOIN ingredients i ON r.ingredient_id = i.ingredient_id LEFT JOIN menu_items m ON r.menu_item_id = m.menu_item_id LIMIT 20;
